titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an interest deduction for contingent interest on a shared appreciation mortgage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/25/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit, as an interest deduction, the deduction of contingent interest on a shared appreciation mortgage. Defines the term "contingent interest."
